name: RedShift Zero
slogan: Data science company using machine intelligence and human-in-the-loop

jobs.title: Lead Software Engineer
jobs.description:
We are looking for a versatile full-stack software engineer to bootstrap an engineering division in a well-funded tech start-up. This is a tremendous opportunity to get in on the ground floor of a business-oriented and extremely well-organised operation, especially if you are interested in the fashion industry.


Applicants should enjoy working collaboratively in a fast-paced environment. They must also be comfortable working with a cloud-based infrastructure. The most suitable candidates will be self-starters, have excellent communication skills and be comfortable switching from big-picture thinking to projects requiring surgical attention to detail.

 

Responsibilities

- As one of the first RedShift Zero joiners, you will work with the founder, be fully hands on, happy to take input and collaborate
- Develop scalable software, web services and database solutions to support our research and applications
- Collaborate with external agencies and third-party services
- Communicate updates and data driven insights to investors and stakeholders

Requirements 

- Ideal candidates will have a minimum of 5 years’ experience of writing top quality code in a commercial environment
- A strong academic background, preferably with a degree in a technical field
- Excellent coding proficiency in at least one modern programming language such as Java, C#, Node.js etc.
- Knowledge of a modern front-end JavaScript framework such as React, Angular or Vue JS
- Ability to architect a database using SQL or NoSQL database technologies

We are looking for a versatile full-stack software engineer to bootstrap an engineering division in a well-funded tech start-up. The most suitable candidates will be self-starters, have excellent communication skills and be comfortable switching from big-picture thinking to projects requiring surgical attention to detail.

  • Ideal candidates will have a minimum of 5 years’ experience of writing top quality code in a commercial environment
